padcms.kiosk.view.action

Class Downloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • padcms.kiosk.view.action.Downloader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Downloader
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Downloader is used to download file from the Internet. It extends Thread and runs in self thread.
